mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ks_board_activity WHERE BOARD_TYPE = #{boardType} AND BOARD_SUB_TYPE = #{boardSubType} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY BOARD_DATE DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT BOARD_DATE FROM ks_board_activity WHERE BOARD_TYPE = #{boardType} AND BOARD_SUB_TYPE = #{boardSubType} GROUP BY BOARD_DATE ORDER BY BOARD_DATE DESC

SELECT BOARD_NO , BOARD_ORDER , BOARD_DATE , BOARD_TYPE , BOARD_SUB_TYPE , TITLE FROM komsia.ks_board_activity WHERE BOARD_TYPE = #{boardType} AND BOARD_SUB_TYPE = #{boardSubType} AND BOARD_DATE = #{boardDate} ORDER BY BOARD_ORDER

SELECT REPLY_NO , BOARD_TYPE , BOARD_SUB_TYPE , REPLY_NO , REPLY_CONTENT , REG_ID AS REPLY_REG_ID , REG_DTTM AS REPLY_REG_DTTM FROM ks_board_activity_reply WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND BOARD_TYPE = #{boardType} AND BOARD_SUB_TYPE = #{boardSubType} ORDER BY REG_DTTM
